thermodynamic entropy
dS= dQ/T (reversible process)

Boltzmann entropy
S = k ln (W)
where W is the number of microstates


Enthalpy
H = U + PV
where U is internal energy

If P is constant (dP=0)
dH = dQ

我諗係Principle of least action 同Newtonian mechanics 嘅分別。Newtonian mechanics 係只要有given initial data 就可以預測未來（solve ODEs)， 好似命定論。 但Principle of least action係睇哂所有all possible paths, 然後再搵一條optimised energy path出嚟。所以可能相對貼合現實

Qcd我淨係學咗好基本，睇吓有無其他巴絲可以補充。一般嚟講，你有一個theory嘅Lagrangian之後，無論coupling constant畀唔畀你做expansion都好，都要derive咗feynman rules先。因為要睇下做唔做到renormalisation，同埋要知gauge invariance有無加咗啲新嘅interaction。

Qcd其實係將qed generalised，但因為qed嘅symmetry係abelian所以比qcd少咗幾種interaction，qcd多咗gauge boson嘅self interactions (from extra terms in covariant derivative)同埋ghosts。雖然做唔到expansion，但係我都可以抽一個order出嚟check。直係要計amplitude就要用numerical嘅方法做，例如lattice qcd, monte carlo嗰啲，不過我無乜接觸過。又或者調返轉係用實驗去搵返個parton distribution function。所以qcd真係好難做

去返virtual particle嘅問題，feynman diagram只係令你計數方便啲，你畫到只係代表你可以計到條數。Qed係perturbative，counter term嘅diagram你都畫到，但唔代表真係會搵到一粒嘢係counter term。能夠度到嘅只係initial同final state
